venue.name: Back in Touch Wellness Center, LLC.

item.description: In this workshop you will learn Qi Gong and Pi Gu (pronounced Bi Gu). Pi Gu technique is a type of Qi Gong that is used to shrink the stomach. The result will prevent hunger and stop food addictions. You will learn to retrain your mind to help you lose weight. Using the proper herbs and food in conjunction with Qi Gong heals chronic weight gain, cancer, diabetes, cardiac disease, and other common disorders.  During the workshop we will discuss a 30 day regimen incorporating specific foods, herbs, Qi Gong exercises, meditation, goal setting and more empowering you with tools to change your life - feeling good and loving yourself.
item.name: Qi Gong for Weight Loss
